title: Detective Blinky; Blink Bill's wedding picnic.
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "The Adventures of Blinky Bill". Two adventures with Australia's most lovable Koala. "Detective Blinky": Someone is stealing the berries from the town's only Mulgaberry bush. Detective Blinky is on the case with Splodge to catch the culprit. "Blinky Bill's wedding picnic": Blinky's mother and Nutsy's father are getting married and a big celebration is planned. At the wedding picnic, everyone has a good time and the Dingos finally learn to live in harmony with everyone.
